values.description:
We pride ourselves on professionalism, an enjoyable working experience and satisfied clients. We offer a broad range of services and produce work of the highest standard in each area. 

We are based in Brighton, but on many projects we can work with you wherever you are in the world. If you’d like to talk to us about your next project please get in touch.
values.name: Unitone Productions

values.description:
We provide a variety of services for LGBT young people and we are staffed by a part-time Project Director, a team leader, two part-time Youth Support Workers, a Youth Volunteering Development Worker, three peer support workers, a part-time administrator and a team of 25 volunteers. A Teen to Adult Personal Advisor has been seconded to the project full-time from CAMHS.

An average of thirty young people attend our services and an average of eight young people currently receive one-to-one support each week either face-to-face, by phone or email.

Our Purpose

Allsorts works to raise awareness, promote good practice and facilitate the creation of safer and more supportive environments for LGBT young people in the wider community by:

• Supporting vulnerable, alienated or marginalized young people in Brighton and Hove and the surrounding area who are LGBT or unsure of their sexuality and/or gender identity

• Delivering peer led homophobia, biphobia and transphobia awareness and anti-bullying workshops in schools, colleges and youth organisations

• Providing training for adults and agencies working with young people

• Providing promotional and educational materials (booklets, toolkits, stickers, posters etc)
values.name: Allsorts Youth Project

We are a dedicated, enthusiastic and like-minded group, with a genuine interest in what we do. 

Oh, and we're also a nice bunch of people.

Node Design
values.description:
Node is...
a small, multi-discipline Brighton design agency. Formed around a designer / copywriter partnership of the type favoured by larger creative agencies, we offer a wide range of design services, including web design, illustration and branding. In addition, we provide help & support with editorial content, online marketing and CRM strategy on a consultancy basis.

A Queen's English (AQE Ltd) is a UK-based educational travel agency that specialises in the planning and execution of study trips for international secondary school students aged 13 to 17.

AQE endeavours to provide international secondary schools with a unique insight into the reasoning, planning and execution of study tours abroad. This is in a bid to underline the value of extra-curricular activities and integrate them more fully into school curriculums. 

We work closely with our clients to create study tours that are meticulously designed to inspire students to grow in self-confidence. Students will benefit hugely from mixing with other young people from a wealth of nationalities and backgrounds.

From our offices in the UK’s premier resort city of Brighton and Hove, just one hour from London, AQE offers your group a reassuring presence from the moment they arrive in the UK.

values: Promoting Extra-Curricular Travel in Secondary Schools
Promoting the UK as a Study Destination

values.name: A Queen's English (AQE LTD)

values.description:

Our specialist areas include Media, Arts, Collaborative Consumption, Fashion & Retail and Charity.

values.description:
TexRAD Limited was launched in February 2011 with leading medical imaging companies; Imaging Equipment Limited (IEL), Cambridge Computed Imaging Ltd and Miles Medical Pty Ltd as partners.  

TexRAD is a new spin-off from the University of Sussex (UK) and is a software application developed by Dr Balaji Ganeshan, Research Fellow at the Brighton and Sussex Medical School.  The specific applications of TexRAD include predicting early response to treatment, prognosis and tissue characterization.  Particularly in colorectal cancer, TexRAD can identify patients earlier with poor prognosis and thereby can assist clinicians to modify treatment at the early stages and so improve patient outcome.  TexRAD can be integrated easily within existing hospital imaging systems without the need for any hardware modifications and can also be accessed via a pay-per-click service.

The software can extract and quantify 'hidden' information from existing scans (CT,MIR, etc) thereby increasing considerably the depth of information given by radiological images.  

It is hoped that TexRAD will potentially support early diagnosis in other diseases and long term conditions such as dementia and other long term conditions, enabling early intervention and reducing disease progression.
values.name: TexRAD Limited
Scarlet Monday Group
values.description:
Scarlet is a Brighton-based consultancy for people who run businesses. Scarlet specialises in helping bosses grow their companies better.

Scarlet works by quickly analysing what’s blocking you and your company’s success: normally strategy or people. A plan is agreed which Scarlet can then help you implement. Scarlet can be your chairman, coach, consultant or taskmaster: whatever you need.

Collectively we've gained lots of experience working with large companies such as Sony, Financial Times and Channel 4, as well as start-ups, small teams and agencies.

This isn't just a job for us. We really enjoy what we do and believe that it shows in our work.

With the acquisition of Camberley Auto Factors, two companies built on such similar priniciples are now working together to combine strengths and cover an area from Brighton to Newcastle with over 90 branches.

values.description:
Full Moon Games Studios are a small innovative game company focused on digitally-distributed casual games in Brighton, UK.

The video game industry is getting exciting. Right now represents an incredible opportunity for change. Industry innovations like free-to-play casual games, digital distribution, investor funding and results-based production are just a few of the changes we are seeing in studios and publishers throughout the industry. Individually they are in practice at very successful studios all around the world. Like how Blizzard changed the MMO; we’re not trying to reinvent the wheel, we’re just trying to put the pieces together the right way.
values.name: Full Moon Game Studios

values.description:
Zerofiftyone is a wonderful mix of old hands and new, dynamic people who like to absorb the knowledge and then try it for themselves. We are in a constant state of discovery, learning new ways of doing things, but always seeking to enhance the performance of our clients. 

We do great looking, affordable websites and all the work around them to get them in front of your public. We design everything from business cards to 48 sheet posters, devise media strategies which include television, radio and outdoor, write original copy, and participate fully in the business life of our clients. 

We also love sport - and have a dedicated sports marketing agency called 051 Sports Marketing that enables our MD Neil Macadam to indulge his love of horseracing and keep our clients Plumpton, Brighton, Fontwell and Lingfield front of mind. 

We're great at integrated campaigns and can do everything from Facebook advertising to database cleansing and email news letter creation and fulfillment. We also ask the right questions - of you, of the media you'll be using and ultimately, of your customers. 

Why not book a meeting to see how this process works? (That was a question). 

We have an office overlooking the English Channel and constant running tea and coffee. Some of our clients have had their best year ever. Come and find out how they did i
values.name: Zerofiftyone

values.description:
A social design and web software company based in Brighton, UK.

Dharmafly was born of the intention to wield the web - the greatest medium the world has known - for good works in the world. We've aimed to straddle the edge of possibilities with web technology, be an advocate for open source and help people achieve their vision through active listening, meticulous craft and creativity. We've strived to be a company that supports not only our clients and workers but also the wider community, by establishing city-based projects and programmes. 

We've won awards for our work and created products for the BBC, The Guardian, the Science Museum and social enterprises like Participle.

Our main technologies are JavaScript, (for instance, HTML5 scripting on the front-end and Node.js on the back-end), along with Python and Django, and to a lesser extent other languages and frameworks like Ruby on Rails, Perl, XSLT and PHP.
values.name: Dharmafly
